content.title: Map the Service to the UI Elements
content.body:
1. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > Service - RecipientStorage$Recipients$get > records {collection}.
    From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Forms > frmDetails.
  2. In the mapping editor, map the following service parameters to the UI elements:
    • From the left pane select RecipientID {number}.
      From the right pane expand Label - lblRecipientIDValue,and select text {string}.
      Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types.
      Click OK.
